Proposals"],"valueId":["23 - Proposals"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["UserStory"],"valueId":["UserStory"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"Proposals","cssClass":"c12"}]}, {"id":"LR-176","entityId":"2-372","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Bug with scrolling to selected day of weekly order"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nina Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1568634036564"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"176"},{"name":"description","value":"

Page: eater's order page.
Steps to reproduce: when clicking on day picker tabs (or selecting day on week picker component) scrolling into view doesn't work for sunday (last element in toolbar) in Chrome browser version >= 52.
Link: https://github.com/iamdustan/smoothscroll/issues/28
Expected behaviour: clicking on day picker tabs should scroll to selected date in check on toolbar.

Scrolling works properly when function scrollIntoView has default parameters instead of behavior: 'smooth'
